sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./post.css"; import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons"; import FavoriteIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Favorite"; import ThumbUpIcon from "@material-ui/icons/ThumbUp"; export default function Post({ post }) { return (
Username Here {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} Likes
{post.comment} comments
); }
